creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Trust Fund
description: quadruped with rounded body, short legs with four toes on each foot, and wing-like appendages; scales on back and stomach; head is on center of body; open mouth with bared teeth; two small horns; forked tail; row of scrolling plates down back; red gemstone eyes; inlaid gems of various colors and types throughout; head removable
title: Censer in the shape of a mythical beast
